attributes.action: Ensure all new drivers pass the Theory & Hazard perception tests before they are allowed onto the road for the first time ensuring that the basic road craft knowledge is in place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Far to many new drivers are getting into a car for the first time on the nations highways without taking a look at the highway code let alone study material for a test. Passing the test before being allowed on the road will eventually lead to a safer driver and thats what this country needs, safer drivers
